org.hkijena.acaq5.api.parameters

Class ACAQDynamicParameterHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.acaq5.api.parameters.ACAQDynamicParameterHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACAQCustomParameterHolder, ACAQParameterHolder

    public class ACAQDynamicParameterHolder
extends Object
implements ACAQCustomParameterHolder
    Holds a user-definable set of parameters

      • beginModificationBlock

        public void beginModificationBlock()
        Halts all ParameterStructureChangedEvent until endModificationBlock() is called. Use this method for many changes at once

      • endModificationBlock

        public void endModificationBlock()
        Ends a modification block started by beginModificationBlock(). Triggers a ParameterStructureChangedEvent
